name: mck
body:
Software Engineer at FINN.no, working on core platform systems.  
Builds distributed systems using Cassandra and Hadoop.


  

An open source enthusiast.  
A Cassandra MVP.  
An Apache Tiles PMC.  


  

Father to 3 beautiful daughters, who continue to teach me.  
Married to the love of my life, who continues to inspire me.


  

![](http://d13pix9kaak6wt.cloudfront.net/avatar/users/w/e/v/wever_1359805405_09.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
